showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘Camelot’ has been a crowd-pleaser since it opened at the dawn of the Kennedy Administration...For it to return as anything but a museum piece would require spectacular design, knockout leads, or a truly daring new book; all are absent on the Vivian Beaumont stage.” 

Read more
